featured.text: Soon Saratoga Chips appeared on the menu and became so popular that people wanted to take some home.

definition.zh_def: 薄脆的食物，通常由馬鈴薯或玉米製成，經過油炸或烘烤。
definition.en_def: Thin, crispy snacks typically made from potatoes or corn, often fried or baked.
definition.example: I bought a bag of chips to enjoy during the movie.
